markdownRemark.excerpt: One of the key ideas in CS is to reuse. This  ANYTHING that has been done three times are likely to be done more times, and should be automated.

One of the key ideas in CS is to reuse. This

ANYTHING that has been done three times are likely to be done more times, and should be automated.

frontmatter.title: You should beat a department
frontmatter.description: As a real programmer (and on the path towards a real hacker), always have the ambition of beating a whole department. Persuit of efficiecy is essential in this short, uncertain life.

frontmatter.title: Use entr to automate your work
Use entr to automate your work
